title: AFK Journey Tier List
description: AFK Journey is an idle RPG game that has taken the mobile gaming world by storm. With its simple yet addictive gameplay, AFK Journey has amassed a large player base. However, like any other game, AFK Journey has a meta, and some heroes are simply better than others. This tier list will help you navigate the ever-changing AFK Journey meta and build the best team possible.
